Articles.Content:
Here is an image of a new part im working on, the blue origin booster!

As you can see I only have the booster, the rest of the parts are stock but I am working on making the rest of the parts (Including the landing legs!)
Looking good can't wait to try it

That looks amazing! Just make sure you get BO's PR departments permission, so you don't end up like the guy who made the SNC Dreamchaser mod (SNC sent him a Cease and Desist). I can't wait to see it finished.

It looks a bit small, the capsule is supposed to seat 6 which would need double the capacity of the mk2

Edited December 6, 2015 by selfish_meme

53 minutes ago, selfish_meme said:

It looks a bit small, the capsule is supposed to seat 6 which would need double the capacity of the mk2

This is one thing that does bug me how are you going to get 6 kerbals in there have you seen how big a kerbal is next to a pod ? You couldn't get 6 kerbal heads in a pod and really look at the size to any engine even in RO so call life size a kerbal is bigger then the engines , Now found you a picture on the web of just about any launcher engine and you will see the a human can fit inside of the bell and some more then one human but not  with any mod, I have seen can you do that in KSP

But really it's your game play how you like
I made a 6 kerbal pod for my stock new shepard replica, you can find it in my sig on kerbalx
LOL pack how ever many you want in a pod that they can't fit in ( If that is your thing thats fine ) but it's not my thing think you and if, I wanted 6, I would just edit the file my self
They can fit in, thats what I meant, no tricks they actually all fit correctly
well if your only doing a short sub orbital hop there is less systems needed in the pod so you could possible fit 6 kerbals in a 2.5m pod
It's only just possible to get 6 in a 3.75m fairing pod, they would never physically fit in a 2.5m
looks really good !! have you ever just the right ship to?

On December 4, 2015 at 2:39 PM, DarthVader said:

That looks amazing! Just make sure you get BO's PR departments permission, so you don't end up like the guy who made the SNC Dreamchaser mod (SNC sent him a Cease and Desist). I can't wait to see it finished.

That seems like nonsense to me, and worth ignoring as long as it's freely distributed. If not, you'd have to get permission to draw a picture of it, and mail it to someone, which is absurd.
if someone has the source files for this id be happy to get it up and running.
